title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
content: Up for auction are two lots.LOT 1: FRESH 0.5 LTC - ICG MS68 LOT 2: Moonbits 2018 0.001 SF - ICG MS67 Both coins are factory funded with their respective values.The Moonbits chip is from the first run of silver-finish MB chips. More info here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0Starting bid: Lot 1: 0.0025BTC  (FRESH LTC)Lot 2: 0.0010BTC  (MOONBITS BTC)minimum increments per lot: 0.0005BTCShipping: Not included. Shipping will be based on location and preference. Ships from minerjones.End date: Sunday, 2nd of July, 4 pm (NY time)Sniping: Bids in the last 5 minutes extend the auction to a maximum of 5 minutes after the last bid. Works seperately for each lot.Payment: Bitcoin only. Payment address will be provided after auction end (only via Bitcointalk pm and with my user-ID 949248).I may accept some shitaltcoin (LTC, XMR, ETH, SOL, MATIC, Doge...) on request. Send a PM prior to bidding to confirm.Other:Proof of funds or a collateral may be asked from new accounts to be eligible to bid on the auction.I reserve the right to reject bids from or deny sale to any individual in extrem cases (for example lots of negative trust or erratic spamming).
